meanings.definition: The measurement around a person's waist.
meanings.sent1: She carefully took the waistlines of the pants to ensure they would fit.
meanings.sent2: His waistlines had expanded over the years due to lack of exercise.
meanings.sent3: The tailor chuckled as he measured the waistlines, joking about holiday indulgences.
meanings.sent4: Her waistlines were like a boundary between her upper and lower body, defining her shape.
meanings.sent5: The waistlines of the dress were so tight, she could barely breathe.

meanings.definition: The narrow part of a garment that fits around the waist.
meanings.sent1: The dress had a beautiful ribbon at the waistlines, accentuating her figure.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the waistlines of her skirt to make it more comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The waistlines of the pants were so high, they almost reached her chest!
meanings.sent4: The waistlines of the jacket hugged his body, making him look slimmer.
meanings.sent5: The waistlines of the dress were adorned with delicate lace, adding a touch of elegance.
